title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4204.11 - Information to be furnished by concessionaires
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4204.11 - Information to be furnished by concessionaires

State Regulations

Any persons, firm, association or corporation which holds
any concession, right or privilege to perform any services or sell any article
at any track at which pari-mutuel quarter horse racing meets are conducted must
submit to the commission the names of all personnel employed at the track
including such information that the commission shall require concerning each
employee, copies of all written contracts and agreements and a summary of all
verbal contracts and agreements, list of stockholders annually, list of
officers and directors and annual compensation paid to each and upon the sale
or transfer of any stock of any concessionaire, evidence of such sale or
transfer must be submitted to the commission by affidavit verifying that said
transfer or sale is in compliance with section 63 of article 3 of the

Pari-Mutuel Revenue Law, as amended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4204.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
